item.title: Day 127, 2 Samuel 6-7, 1 Chronicles 17
item.description: David brings the ark to Jerusalem, but becomes afraid of God when God kills Uzzah for touching the ark. He sends it to the house of Obed-edom, where the ark stayed for some time.
